summary: Implement Nexus support in the PHP SDK to enable cross-workflow and cross-SDK communication. This is part of the broader Nexus feature rollout across all Temporal SDKs.
userImpact: Users cannot utilize Nexus capabilities in PHP applications until this feature is implemented.
proposedFix: Implement Temporal-specific Nexus functionality in the PHP SDK following the pattern established in other SDKs (referenced in features/609).
keyQuote: Is there already a timetable for when this feature will be released? We are very interested in using Nexus.
